user.title: Connect to ACWD Portal
user.description:
Enter your ACWD portal credentials (portal.acwd.org).

Your credentials are stored securely in Home Assistant and used only to retrieve water usage data from your account.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to ACWD portal

import_hourly_data.name: Import hourly water usage data
import_hourly_data.description: Import hourly water usage data for a specific date into long-term statistics for the Energy Dashboard.

date.name: Date
date.description: Date to import data for (YYYY-MM-DD). Must be at least 1 day ago due to ACWD's reporting delay.

import_daily_data.name: Import daily water usage data
import_daily_data.description: Import daily water usage data for a date range into long-term statistics.

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: Start date for import (YYYY-MM-DD) — must be at least 1 day prior to today due to ACWD reporting delay

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: End date for import (YYYY-MM-DD) — must be at least 1 day prior to today due to ACWD reporting delay
